metadata.dc:author: Pascual Fuster, Vicente
Solà Alberich, Rosa
Meco López, José Félix
metadata.dc:description: This paper describes what are plant sterols, the chemical structure to understand their mechanism of cholesterol-lowering action, and indications and contraindications in clinical practice.
metadata.dc:subject: Esteroles vegetales
Plant sterols
metadata.dc:title: La utilización de los esteroles vegetales en la práctica clínica: de la química a la clínica.
[Using plant sterols in clinical practice: From the chemistry to the clinic].
metadata.dc:publisher: Clinica e investigacion en arteriosclerosis : publicacion oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Arteriosclerosis
